alert.note: Alert for Warren; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 5:10PM EDT until May 16 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Berkshire County in western Massachusetts... Northeastern Warren County in east central New York... Eastern Washington County in east central New York... Bennington County in southern Vermont... Windham County in southern Vermont... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 510 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Whitehall to North Adams, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bennington, North Adams, Brattleboro, Bellows Falls, Whitehall, Arlington, Londonderry, Townshend, Salem, Manchester, Stratton, Monroe, Shaftsbury, Putney, Granville, Hartford, Vernon, Dorset, Wilmington and Stamford. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
